sect1.title: Thread Local Storage
sect1.para: The header file <CGAL/tss.h> provides a macro CGAL_STATIC_THREAD_LOCAL_VARIABLE(TYPE,VAR,ARG1) that creates a thread local variable VAR of type TYPE, and passes ARG1 to the constructor. The variable is either thread_local, or just a local variable if CGAL_HAS_THREADS is not defined.

sect1.title: Mutex
sect1.para: The header file <CGAL/mutex.h> provides a macro CGAL_MUTEX equivalent to std::mutex and a macro CGAL_SCOPED_LOCK(M) that is a std::unique_lock<std::mutex>.
